definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: If yes, by which the Quality System is issued?
sentences.chinese: 如有質量體系認證，是由何機構簽發？

sentences.english: CEG will initiate new supplier qualification process if required.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，專家團將啓動供應商認證流程。

sentences.english: Trade certification is available, but voluntary, in Québec.
sentences.chinese: 在魁北克省行業認證是可用的，但是自願的。

sentences.english: Data security by providing support for username and password authentication and for digital certificates.
sentences.chinese: 通過支持用戶名和密碼認證以及數字證書的數據安全。

sentences.english: The companies say OMP is safe and FDA-approved.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司聲明OMP是安全的且經FDA認證。

sentences.english: Our products have passed authoritative certification and all quality indexes are in line with international standard.
sentences.chinese: 產品的質量經過權威認證，各項指標均達到國家標準。

sentences.english: For more information, access the Cisco About Recertification page.
sentences.chinese: 有關詳細信息，請進入思科關於重新認證頁面。

sentences.english: To qualify excellent elementary school principal brand could be considered.
sentences.chinese: 辦理優質品牌校長認證，全面提升國民小學經營績效。

sentences.english: Focus on the certifications that give you the most bang for the buck.
sentences.chinese: 將注意力放在那些能夠帶給你最大收益的認證上。

sentences.english: The new campus is LEED certified, and the company is working on reduced packaging.
sentences.chinese: 新校區LEED認證，公司正在減少包裝工作。

sentences.english: Labor and Social Security Department Director of the Center for Occupational accreditation Chen told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 勞動和社會保障部中心主任陳職業資格認證對記者說。

sentences.english: In order to export their products, many companies are urgent to apply for product certification by the country concerned.
sentences.chinese: 爲了出口，很多企業急需辦理相關國家的產品認證。
使用通過ISO認證的環保油墨印製。

sentences.english: Manure from genetically modified animals is not certifiable.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因動物來源肥料不可被認證。
爲什麼穿斯內爾認證的頭盔？

definition: to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
